greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Restricted growth sequence transform of A286570, combining A009194(n) and A046523(n), i.e., gcd(n,sigma(n)) and the prime signature of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ This function from A046523
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 01 2018
